name: Seadra
flavorText:
Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

previous.name: Horsea
previous.flavorText:
Known to shoot
down flying bugs
with precision blasts of ink
from the surface
of the water.

next.name: Goldeen
next.flavorText:
Its tail fin
billows like an
elegant ballroom dress, giving it
the nickname of
the Water Queen.

pokemon.name: Kingdra
pokemon.flavorText:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.
